thread.title: British actor Idris Elba proposes to girlfriend at film screening

title: British actor Idris Elba proposes to girlfriend at film screening
text:
British actor Idris Elba proposes to girlfriend at film screening 6:01am EST - 00:37 
British actor Idris Elba goes down on one knee at screening of his new movie ''Yardie'' at cinema in East London. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
